city¶

Module Contents¶

Classes¶

City

City Class.
class city.City(population, density=10000, has_walls=False, has_castle=False, has_river=False)¶

City Class.

Parameters

  • population (int) – Number of people in the city.

  • density (int) – density of the city 10000 by default.

  • has_walls (boolean) – walls or not.

  • has_castle (boolean) – castle or not.

  • has_river (boolean) – river or not.

components(self)¶
Returns

the components of the city
